For more information, see https://tasvideos.org/6435M TAS originally published on 2025-03-15Balatro is a poker-themed deck-building roguelite game developed by LocalThunk and published by Playstack in 2024. Using a deck of regular playing cards, players are tasked to score a minimum amount of chips each round with a limited amount of hands and discards. A complete run features 8 Antes, each with 3 blinds: the Small Blind, the Big Blind and a Boss Blind. Both Small and Big Blinds can be skipped if they opt to use a tag, with unique effects. Players can also improve their decks with Jokers, Tarot and Spectral cards, with unique effects. Planet cards can be used to upgrade a hand up a level. All of these as well as regular or enhanced playing cards can be bought in the shop after each round. Vouchers are also available there, with effects lasting for the rest of the run if bought. rythin ( https://tasvideos.org/Users/Profile/rythin) plays through the tutorial, winning a run on it in record time.
